name: kgsmmodem4j
short_description: Java API for GSM modems. Allows sending and receiving SMS. Capable to dial out and receive calls in data mode. Contains driver classes for Wavecom and Siemens GSM modems. Extandable. Developers are welcome to supply new drivers.
